title: Global barley producers by country 2018/19
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Amount in million metric tons in the y axis.
The Amount in million metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Country European Union and lowest at Country Belarus.
There is a difference of 54.64 between the maximum Country European Union and minimum Country Belarus.
min_summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Amount in million metric tons in each Country on the y axis.
Country European Union has the highest Amount in million metric tons and Belarus has the lowest Amount in million metric tons.
